reference.title: Setting Memory Quota
reference.shortdesc: Memory quota is set with the POST /pools/default HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: The memory quota configures how much RAM to be allocated to Couchbase Server for every node within the cluster.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: POST /pools/default HTTP/1.1 Host: localhost:8091 Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4= Content-Length: xx memoryQuota=[quotaNumber]
curl -X POST -u [admin]:[password] -d memoryQuota=[quotaNumber] -d indexMemoryQuota=[quotaNumber] -d ftsMemoryQuota=[quotaNumber] http://localhost:port/pools/default

section.title: Example
section.p: Raw HTTP request that sets the memory quota for a cluster at 400MB:
section.codeblock: POST /pools/default HTTP/1.1 Host: 127.0.0.1:8091 Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4= Content-Length: xx memoryQuota=400
